text: phu sraththa thanghlay! Cng pen phu ptibati hnathi dwy di pheux xallxh pen phyan dwy khwam theiyngthrrm læa cng xya hıkar keliyd chang phwk hnung phwk dı thahı phwk cea mi yutithrrm cng yutithrrm theid man pen sing thi kıl kab khwam yakerng ying kwa læa phung yakerng xallxh theid thæ cring xallxh nan pen phuthrng rxbru xyang laxeiyd nı sing thi phwk cea kratha kan
